0.text: Innate: Riven gains a Charge for 6 seconds every time she uses an ability, stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on subsequent ability casts. Riven's basic attacks consume a Charge to deal 30% − 60% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage.

1.text: The bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Riven can activate Broken Wings three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 0.3125-second static cooldown between casts. If Riven does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, the ability goes on cooldown.

1.text: Each of the three casts has Riven slash with her sword, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck,  resetting her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of Broken Wings if there are any.

2.text: First Cast: Riven  dashes up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, affecting all enemies around the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.

3.text: Second Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects.

4.text: Third Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects in an expanded radius while also  knocking back all affected enemies 75 units over 0.75 seconds. This cast can cross terrain.

0.text: Active: Riven causes her sword to emit a burst of runic energy around her before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
Active: Riven  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while  shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and  Broken Wings may be cast during  Ki Burst or  Blade of the Exile cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.(note)

2.text: Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Riven mends her broken blade and empowers it for 15 seconds, gaining 20% AD  bonus attack damage,  75 bonus attack range, and increased range on  Broken Wings and  Ki Burst for the duration. After 0.5 seconds, she gains the ability to cast  Wind Slash once for the duration.

Active: Riven unleashes a wave of energy through three missiles spread in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage once to all enemies they pass through, increased by 0% − 200% (based on missing health).

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Riven causes her sword to emit a burst of runic energy around her before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
Active: Riven  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while  shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.

Active: Riven  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while  shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.

Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack reduces the target's armor by 5%, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 35% / 15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: Champion takedowns remove Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heal you for 15% of your maximum health over 2 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
